text:
@GeorgeTakei I will stand up anytime I see this happen. Or, we have learned nothing from history. This can be allowed to be repeated.

The Coronavirus doesn't care what race, religion, or political party one supports. To the virus, we are a meal and a means of reproduction, nothing more...
